name: Oil Filter
description: Genuine Oil Filter for Maruti Suzuki Swift, Baleno, and Dzire. Ensures clean oil circulation.

name: Brake Pads (Front)
description: High-performance front brake pads for Hyundai Creta, i20, and Venue. Excellent stopping power.

name: Shell Helix Ultra 5W-40
description: Fully synthetic motor oil for ultimate engine performance and protection.

name: Clutch Plate Assembly
description: Original Tata clutch plate for Nexon, Harrier, and Altroz. Smooth gear shifting.

name: Air Filter
description: Genuine Air Filter for improved engine breathability and fuel efficiency.

name: Spark Plug Set (4 pcs)
description: Set of 4 genuine spark plugs for Hyundai petrol engines (i10, i20, Verna). Reliable ignition.

name: Suspension Strut (Front)
description: Front suspension strut for comfortable ride quality on uneven roads. Fits Swift/Dzire.

name: Headlight Assembly
description: Crystal clear headlight assembly for Tata Tiago. High visibility and perfect fitment.

name: Timing Belt Kit
description: Complete timing belt kit including tensioner. Essential for engine maintenance.

name: Fuel Filter (Diesel)
description: High-efficiency diesel fuel filter for Hyundai Creta and Verna diesel models.

name: Disk Brake Rotor
description: Ventilated front disc brake rotor. targeted for Swift and Baleno for heat dissipation.

name: Wiper Blade Set
description: All-weather frameless wiper blades. Clean streak-free wiping for clear visibility.

name: Coolant (1L)
description: Premium concentrate coolant. Prevents overheating and corrosion.

name: Side Mirror Assembly (LHS)
description: Electric adjustable side view mirror for Baleno (Left Side). Body colored cap compatible.

name: Alternator Assembly
description: Heavy-duty alternator for Tata Nexon Diesel. Ensures consistent battery charging.
